org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.cfg

Class InputStreamConfigurationSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.cfg.InputStreamConfigurationSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationSource

    public class InputStreamConfigurationSource
extends Object
implements ConfigurationSource
    A simple InputStream based ConfigurationSource Implementation. This implementation allows multiple input streams to be composed as a singe configuration source instance. The current implementation only supports 'JSON' streams. Internally the inputstreams are loaded as JSON nodes and they are logically merged in to a singe JSON node tree. The order of merge is as per the order of the input streams.

      • InputStreamConfigurationSource

        public InputStreamConfigurationSource(boolean allowNullStreams,
                                      boolean throwErrorOnMismatchedTypes,
                                      InputStream... inputStreams)
        Constructor for InputStreamConfigurationSource
        Parameters:
        allowNullStreams - Configuration to specify whether the implementation will allow the passing of null inputstreams
        throwErrorOnMismatchedTypes - Configuration to specify whether the error should be thrown on mismatch of data types during merge of input stream content
        inputStreams - The array of input streams to be merged
